mapper.select: SELECT ahc.id_ AS commentId, ahc.type_ AS commentType, ahc.time_ AS submitTime, ahc.user_id_ AS employeeId, aiu.display_name_ AS emplyeeName, aiu.last_ AS departmentName, aiu.first_ AS organizationName, ahc.task_id_ AS taskId, aht.name_ AS taskName, ahc.proc_inst_id_ AS processInstanceId, ahc.message_ AS message, ahc.full_msg_ AS fullMessage FROM act_hi_comment ahc INNER JOIN act_id_user aiu ON ahc.user_id_ = aiu.id_ INNER JOIN act_hi_taskinst aht ON ahc.task_id_ = aht.id_ WHERE ahc.proc_inst_id_ = #{processInstanceId} and ahc.action_ = 'AddComment' ORDER BY ahc.time_ ASC
